description:
When creating an employee, a joined on filled has no sign of showing its mandatory
Go to Admin, then Organisation, then manage employee, create employee, fill all the fields except the "joined on" field, when you submit you will get an error that the filed can not be blank
Expected Behaviour
The field should have the sign to show that it should not be left blank
Actual Behaviour
There is no sign to show the field is mandatory

### How to Submit

Submit a pull request linking to the issue and include the link to the pull request in your submission through the GCI Portal.
name: Mifos - Bug Fix: On employee creation, "joined on" field has no sign of showing it mandatory
